content: बृहत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [बृह्-अति] {@--1@} Large, great, big, bulky; <ls>Māl. 9. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Wide, broad, extensive, far-extended; दिलीपसूनोः स बृहद्भुजांतरं <ls>R. 3. 54.</ls> {@--3@} Vast, ample, abundant. {@--4@} Strong, powerful. {@--5@} Long, tall; देवदारुबृहद्भुजः <ls>Ku. 6. 51.</ls> {@--6@} Fullgrown. {@--7@} Compact, dense. {@--8@} Eldest, or oldest. {@--9@} Bright. {@--10@} Clear, loud (as sound). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} Speech; <ls>Śi. 2. 68.</ls> --ती {@--1@} A large lute. {@--2@} The lute of <ls>Nārada.</ls> {@--3@} A symbolical expression for the number ‘thirty-six’. {@--4@} A part of the body between the breast and backbone. {@--5@} A mantle, wrapper. {@--6@} A reservoir. {@--7@} The eggplant. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of a metre. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} The Veda. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Sāman; <ls>Bg. 10. 35.</ls> {@--3@} Brahman. (बृहत्, बृहता {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Greatly, highly. {@--2@} Clearly, brightly)
